member.name: M:Microsoft.Teams.Apps.EmployeeTraining.Bot.EmployeeTrainingActivityMiddleware.OnTurnAsync(Microsoft.Bot.Builder.ITurnContext,Microsoft.Bot.Builder.NextDelegate,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Processes an incoming activity in middle-ware.
member.param: Context object containing information cached for a single turn of conversation with a user.
The delegate to call to continue the bot middle-ware pipeline.
Propagates notification that operations should be canceled.
member.returns: A task that represents the work queued to execute.
member.remarks: Middle-ware calls the next delegate to pass control to the next middle-ware in the pipeline. If middle-ware doesn’t call the next delegate, the adapter does not call any of the subsequent middle-ware’s request handlers or the bot’s receive handler, and the pipeline short circuits. The turnContext provides information about the incoming activity, and other data needed to process the activity.
